011.comments: Course offered from April 6-June 27, 2020.Prereq:  Admission to MRSc or GCR program; others require permission from the program office at info@mrsc.ubc.caA very important pre-course memo will be sent out by email two weeks prior to class start.   If you do not receive this email 10 days prior to the start of class please contact info@mrsc.ubc.ca to receive one.
